entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High 6. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries or rain showers near noon. Clearing this afternoon. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h this afternoon. High 6. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NDT Monday 17 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 3 except minus 7 inland.
